name: BoatPilot Token
description: BoatPilot bills itself as 'the first, free integrated marine navigation service with augmented reality capabilities for private and commercial yachting markets'. BoatPilot comprises several components: BoatPilot navigation app, Pocket Skipper service app, and BoatGod hardware module. The project claims to have the most complete geo-database. Users get rewarded with NAVY tokens for uploading relevant geodata.
